refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: gok_page_feedbacks_initialize ()
refsect2.para: Initializes this page of the gok settings dialog. This must be called prior to any calls on this page.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if the page was properly initialized, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_page_feedbacks_refresh ()
refsect2.para: Refreshes the controls on the this page from the gok data.

refsect2.title: gok_page_feedbacks_apply ()
refsect2.para: Updates the gok data with values from the controls. Note: This is not used yet. The control values are updated each time the control changes.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if any of the data members have changed, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_page_feedbacks_revert ()
refsect2.para: Revert to the backup settings for this page.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if any of the settings have changed, FALSE if they are all still the same.

refsect2.title: gok_page_feedbacks_backup ()
refsect2.para: Copies all the member settings to backup.

refsect2.title: gok_page_feedbacks_update_controls ()
refsect2.para: Updates the controls so they reflect the given feedback.

listitem.simpara: Controls are changed to display this feedback.

refsect2.title: gok_page_feedbacks_button_clicked_change_name ()
refsect2.para: The button "change name" has been clicked so allow the user to change the name of the feedback.

refsect2.title: gok_page_feedbacks_button_clicked_new ()
refsect2.para: The button "new feedback" has been clicked so add a new feedback.

refsect2.title: gok_page_feedbacks_fill_combo_feedback_names ()
refsect2.para: Fills the combo box that displays the feedback names. This also displays the name of the current feedback in the entry control.

refsect2.title: gok_page_feedbacks_button_clicked_delete ()
refsect2.para: The button "delete feedback" has been clicked so delete the current feedback.

refsect2.title: gok_page_feedbacks_check_keyflashing_clicked ()
refsect2.para: The checkbox has been clicked. Update the current feedback with the change.

refsect2.title: gok_page_feedbacks_spin_keyflashing_changed ()
refsect2.para: The spin control has changed. Update the current feedback with the change.

refsect2.title: gok_page_feedbacks_check_sound_clicked ()
refsect2.para: The checkbox has been clicked. Update the current feedback with the change.

refsect2.title: gok_page_feedbacks_entry_soundname_changed ()
refsect2.para: The sound file name has changed. Update the current feedback with the change.
